Text:
Cheers nedand!!
I really hope you enjoy the story and stick around for more. I will be uploading all of my art for free for fellow downloaders.
A kind word, really does inspire me to write more. Thanks

Many thanks for a great upload. If you need help seeding this or your future publications/uploads contact us at suprbay. 
We'll help you by providing a seedbox "slot".

Happy Christmas keep up the great work from all at team kaiser.
will take you up on that mate.
